mention.text: 30 aug 89 -- defense minister general filmo lopez uzcategui confirmed today that venezuelan soldiers are being deployed to the colombian border in an effort to detect the possible flight of guerrillas or drug traffickers following the offensive launched by the neighboring country 's security forces
defense minister general filmo lopez uzcategui confirmed today that venezuelan soldiers are being deployed to the colombian border in an effort to detect the possible flight of guerrillas
the colombian border in an effort
drug traffickers following the offensive launched by the neighboring country 's security forces
